titleStmt.title: A Canterbury tale translated out of Chaucers old English into our now vsvall langvage whereunto is added the Scots pedler / newly enlarged by A.B.
titleStmt.author: Brome, Alexander, 1620-1666.

notesStmt.note: "Satirical verses against Laud, Archbishop of Canterbury and other prelates." Cf. BM.
Attributed to Alexander Brome. Cf. NUC-pre 1956.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
